definition: abbr. for 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]

sentences.english: Scholarships will be canceled for those who cannot pass the health examination.
sentences.chinese: 入學體檢不合格者，獎學金資格將被取消。

sentences.english: Before you conceive, see your health care provider for a physical exam.
sentences.chinese: 在你懷孕以前，讓醫療服務人員爲你做一次身體檢查。

sentences.english: Are there special places in Taipei for this kind of inspection?
sentences.chinese: 臺北有專門的體檢中心嗎？

sentences.english: "It's like a physical examination of the house," says Zhang.
sentences.chinese: “這就像是在爲房子做體檢，”張磊說。

sentences.english: After the exam, the OB- GYN told her that she was pregnant, and in great shape.
sentences.chinese: 體檢完後，婦產科醫生說她懷孕了，並且肚子已大。

sentences.english: Confirmed, he will be home to let his wife and daughter to a medical examination.
sentences.chinese: 確診後，他回到家便讓妻女去體檢。

sentences.english: BODIE: Yeah, every time I take the physical. Still, what else would I do?
sentences.chinese: 想過，每次體檢的時候。可是，我還能幹什麼呢？

sentences.english: A basic pre-employment medical examination is undertaken for all employees.
sentences.chinese: 對所有員工進行基本的就業前體檢。

sentences.english: Jessica and Michael meet while waiting for a freshman medical check-up[1] at the university hospital.
sentences.chinese: 傑西卡和邁克在大學醫院等待新生體檢的時候遇見。

sentences.english: The study conducted physical examinations of thousands of people over the course of 30 years at regular intervals.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員在30年的時間內定期給幾千人做身體檢查。

sentences.english: When I turned 50, I had a complete physical checkup.
sentences.chinese: 當我50歲時，我給自己做了一次全面的身體檢查。

sentences.english: Your doctor will do a physical exam including a pelvic exam with pap smear.
sentences.chinese: 你的醫生將做一次體檢，包括帶子宮抹片的骨盆檢查。

sentences.english: Scholarships will be canceled for those who cannot pass the health examination in China.
sentences.chinese: 入學體檢不合格者，獎學金資格將被取消。

sentences.english: The report has yet to be confirmed, though rumors that Young has passed a physical for United have also surfaced.
sentences.chinese: 交易尚待確認，儘管有傳言稱揚已經去曼聯體檢了。

sentences.english: Imposture is not allowed, violates will be punished as the regulation stipulates.
sentences.chinese: 體檢時，不得冒名代替，違者按有關規定予以處理。

sentences.english: Methods The ECG characteristics of right bundle branch block and the clinical examination features in all cases were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法逐例分析右束支阻滯心電特點及臨牀體檢資料。

definition: to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
to submit an expense account/to apply for reimbursement/to write off/to wipe out
